summary: An ordinance relating to zoning and providing for the rezoning of a portation of the northwest quarter of the northeast quarter of Section 3-23-4 lying between the west margin of Empire Way and a line 150 feet west of and parallel thereto Except the south 60 feet, more or less, now zoned 1st Manufacturing District; with respect to Use and Area Districts, and amending Ordinance No. 45382, as amended, by adding thereto two new sections numbered 2-284- and 17-230, respectively.
